alert.note: Alert for Gage; Lancaster; Saline; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 4:46AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong wind gusts may impact portions of Lancaster, Seward, Saline and northern Gage Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 444 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms capable of strong wind gusts 6 miles northwest of Dorchester, or 13 miles south of Seward, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Milford around 455 AM CDT. Crete and Pleasant Dale around 500 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Pioneers Park, Emerald, Lincoln Airport, Roca, Holmes Lake Park and Walton. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 366 and 411. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
